Class FirstWithLocale

All Implemented Interfaces:
atg.repository.dp.Constants, atg.repository.dp.DerivationMethod, java.io.Serializable
Deprecated. As of ATG 6.0, replaced by FirstWithLocale 

public class FirstWithLocale
extends atg.repository.dp.FirstWithLocale

This derivation method is the same as atg.repository.dp.FirstWithLocale.

In pre-6.0 versions of Dynamo the FirstWithLocale derivation method was part of this package. In ATG 6 it moved to the atg.repository.dp package, but to preserve backward compatibility in the API this empty subclass was created in the old location.

See Also:
